tagline: A lightweight Wordpress theme based on Bootstrap from Twitter.
name: Boopress
body:
### Welcome to Boopress Theme.
Boopress is a Wordpress theme for users and developers that it's simple and clean. Boopress built
using HTML5 and [Bootstrap]("http://twitter.github.com/bootstrap") structure for Wordpress 3.1 or great.

![Boopress  snapshot](http://lennyvpg.files.wordpress.com/2013/01/boopress-theme.png)

### Share your posts in social network
Boopress have buttons for main social networks like Twitter, Facebook or Google Plus. In the theme options you can disable it.

![Share post in social networks](http://lennyvpg.files.wordpress.com/2013/01/boopress-metadata-post.png)

### Top and bottom menus
You can configure top and bottom menus with custom links, pages or categories. The top menu is the main menu with the main content like access to your business areas. The bottom menu let you publish other links like RSS feed, your Twitter account...

### i18n: Theme in english and spanish
Boopress support internationalisation ([i18n]("http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Internationalization_and_localization")) with support to english and spanish languages.

### Widget
Widget placed in two columns at the bottom, near of the footer.

![Widget at bottom](http://lennyvpg.files.wordpress.com/2013/01/boopress-widget.png)

### Boopress is Open source
You can redistribute or modify this Wordpress theme under the terms of [MPL 2.0]("http://www.mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/index.txt" "Mozilla Public License - MPL 2.0").

### About Boopress Author
Boopress has been written by [@victorpuertas]("http://twitter.com/victorpuertas"). My personal [blog]("http://lennyvpg.wordpress.com") in Wordpress of course.
